TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendItem extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示儲存於 類別的圖例項目。

span.span: Represents a legend item, which is stored in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表圖例項目，它可以是預設或自訂的項目：The class represents a legend item, which can be either a default or custom item: - 預設圖例項目會自動插入到資料數列或資料點的圖例中。Default legend items are automatically inserted into the legend for either data series or data points. 圓形圖和環圈圖的預設項目代表繪製的資料點，而所有其他圖表類型的項目表示繪製的數列。Default entries for pie and doughnut charts represent the plotted data points, whereas entries for all other chart types represent the plotted series. 根據預設，這些圖例項目會使用的資料點或數列的色彩符號色彩的圖例項目文字的數列或資料點的名稱。By default, these legend entries use the data point or series color for the symbol color, and the name of the series or data point for the legend item text. 預設圖例項目可以自訂，或使用刪除在執行階段事件的控制項。Default legend items can be customized or deleted at run time by using the event of the control. - 自訂圖例項目有使用者定義的文字、 符號色彩等等。Custom legend items have user-defined text, symbol color, and so forth. 不同於預設的項目，它們不會與繪製的資料連線。Unlike the default entries, they are not connected with the plotted data. 自訂圖例項目可以加入在設計階段或執行的階段，使用屬性物件。Custom legend items can be added at either design time or run time, using the property of the object. 圖例符號可以是矩形、 線條或標記，視屬性設定物件。Legend symbols can be rectangles, lines or markers, depending on the property setting of a object. 自訂圖例項目的文字取決於屬性。The text of a custom legend item is determined by the property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 請注意，您也可以新增使用的自訂圖例項目`Add`並`Insert`相關聯的方法集合屬性物件。Note that you can also add custom legend items using the `Add` and `Insert` methods associated with the collection property of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public LegendItem (string name, System.Drawing.Color color, string image);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, valuetype System.Drawing.Color color, string image) cil managed
public: LegendItem(System::String ^ name, System::Drawing::Color color, System::String ^ image);

span.span: The name of the legend item.
The color of the legend item.

param.name: image
param.span: 要用於顯示圖例項目的影像的路徑。

span.span: The path of the image to be displayed for the legend item.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱、色彩和影像路徑，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, color and image path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有`image`或`color`參數必須指定。Only the `image` or `color` parameter needs to be specified. 如果同時指定這兩者，`image`參數的優先順序。If both are specified, the `image` parameter has precedence.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目背景漸層的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.

summary.span: 此外，也會判斷是否使用漸層。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 指定圖例項目之背景漸層方向的 列舉。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以判斷是否標題會顯示在漸層，以決定漸層的方向，如果有一個使用的屬性。Use the property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 如果這個屬性僅實作屬性設定為。This property is only implemented if the property is set to . 如需可用的模式的清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 若要使用漸層色彩：To use gradient colors: - 使用屬性來設定主要色彩。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用屬性來設定次要色彩。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 使用此屬性來設定所需的漸層樣式。Use this property to set the desired gradient style. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的影線樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend item.

value.span: 指定圖例項目影線樣式的 列舉。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the hatching style of a legend item.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉會指定使用類型的筆刷的影線樣式。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 規劃圖樣包含透明的背景色彩和背景上繪製線條。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 如需可用的影線樣式的清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 影線線條的色彩由屬性。The color of hatching lines is determined by the property. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

value.span: 值，該值將在繪製背景影像時以透明方式顯示。

span.span: A value that will be displayed as transparent when the background image is drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的輔色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend item.

value.span: 值，用於具有影線或漸層填滿的次要背景色彩。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定的許多次要背景色彩的數個相關屬性的其中一個物件; 正在套用漸層色彩時，會使用。The property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of many objects; it is used when gradient colors are being applied. 如果這個屬性僅實作屬性設定為。This property is only implemented if the property is set to . 您可以設定任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用影線，屬性會決定圖例項目的影線線的色彩。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend item. 要用於圖例資料格的背景漸層色彩：To use gradient colors for a legend cell's background: 若要使用漸層色彩：To use gradient colors: - 使用屬性來設定主要色彩。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用屬性來設定次要色彩。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 使用屬性來設定所需的漸層樣式。Use the property to set the desired gradient style. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of a legend item.

value.span: 值，可用來繪製圖例項目的框線色彩。

span.span: A value used to draw the border color of a legend item.

value.span: 預設色彩為 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值來設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. > [!NOTE] > 如果您將標記用於自訂圖例項目。If you use a marker for a custom legend item. 這個屬性會設定標記的框線色彩。this property will set the border color of the marker. 不過，如果屬性也設定時，其值的優先順序。However, if the property is also set, its value has precedence. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定用於框線的線條樣式。This property determines the line style used for a border. 行可以是實線、 虛線，等等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. 對於其他的框線樣式，請參閱列舉主題。For other border styles, see the enumeration topic. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of a legend item.

value.span: 用來繪製圖例項目的 值。

span.span: A value that is used to draw the legend item.

value.span: 預設色彩為 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這屬性是一個數個相關的屬性，取得或設定許多圖表元素的色彩; 它可以設定為任何 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值。This property is one several related properties that get or set the color of many chart elements; it can be set to any ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果這個屬性設定的資料點和其系列中，資料點色彩會有優先順序。If this property is set for both a data point and its series, the data point color will have precedence. 系列色彩只會用於資料點，不會定義自己的色彩。The series color will only be used for data points that do not define their own color. 如果自訂圖例項目使用的標記，這個屬性會決定標記色彩。If a custom legend item uses a marker, this property will determine the marker color. 不過，如果屬性設定其值，則具有優先順序。However, if the property is set, its value then has precedence. 會忽略這個屬性，如果屬性會指定要用於圖例項目符號的影像。This property will be ignored if the property specifies an image to be used for the legend item symbol. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示為圖例項目符號的影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that will be displayed for a legend item symbol.

value.span: 值，表示影像檔案的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 預設值為空字串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定要用於映像檔符號。This property determines the image file to be used for the symbol. 路徑可以是絕對或相對 URL。The path can be an absolute or a relative URL. 如果您設定背景影像時，該映像將會顯示不論屬性設定。If you set a background image, that image will be displayed regardless of the property setting. 設定屬性，讓映像用來顯示透明的一種色彩。Set the property to enable one color used by the image to appear transparent. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目影像的顯示樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display style of the legend item image.

value.span: 列舉值，指定圖例項目影像的顯示樣式。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the display style of the legend item image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些樣式會判斷如何將顯示的項目對應的符號。These styles determine how the item's corresponding symbol will be displayed. A樣式可以結合樣式。A style can be combined with a style. 若要達成此目的，先設定屬性設。To accomplish this, first set the property to . 然後使用屬性，以指定的標記映像，或屬性，以指定標記樣式。Then use the property to specify a marker image, or the property to specify a marker style. 產生的符號是線條、 影像或標記的組合。The resulting symbol will be a combination of a line and an image or marker. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the markers, if used.

value.span: 值，表示標記框線的 ARGB (Alpha、Red (紅)、Green (綠)、Blue (藍)) 色彩。

span.span: A value that represents the ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color of a marker border.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用標記，將屬性以外的值為。To use markers, set the property to a value other than . 請注意，標記將不會套用到圓形圖、 環圈圖，以及任何堆疊圖表類型。Note that markers will not be applied to pie, doughnut, and any stacked chart types. 自訂圖例，屬性也會設定標記的框線色彩。For custom legends, the property will also set the border color of markers. 屬性設定的優先順序高於屬性設定。The property setting has precedence over the property setting. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 取得或設定標記 (如果使用) 的框線寬度。

summary.span: 以像素為單位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示至影像檔，它可以是絕對或相對 URL 的路徑。Represents a path to an image file, which can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要使用標記，將屬性以外的值為。To use markers, set the property to a value other than . 屬性會優先於屬性。The property takes precedence over the property. 標記影像可以是任何支援的.NET Framework，包括圖示的有效圖形檔。A marker image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 若要設定一個標記影像透明色彩，請使用屬性。To set one color of the marker image to be transparent, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

span.span: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.

value.span: 表示將於繪製資料標記影像時以透明色彩取代之 ARGB (Alpha、紅、綠、藍) 色彩的 值。

span.span: A value that represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來標記映像，將會以透明方式顯示中選取一種色彩。The property is used to select one color in a marker image that will be displayed as transparent. 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值來設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是僅適用於具有物件任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 取得或設定與預設圖例項目關聯之 的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the associated with a default legend item.

value.span: 值，決定與預設圖例項目關聯之數列的名稱。

span.span: A value that determines the name of the series associated with a default legend item.

value.span: 預設值為零長度字串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該只用在事件，以判斷預設圖例項目代表哪一個資料數列。This property should only be used in the event, to determine which data series a default legend entry represents. 屬性會套用至圓形圖和球體圖以外的所有圖表，其預設圖例項目對應到繪製資料點，而不繪製數列。The property applies to all charts except pie and sphere charts; their default legend items correspond to plotted data points, and not to plotted series. 當您處理圓形圖和球體圖時，使用屬性改為。When you deal with pie and sphere charts, use the property instead. 開發人員不應該設定這個屬性。This property should not be set by the developer. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性就適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .

summary.span: 取得或設定與預設圖例項目關聯之 物件的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of a object associated with a default legend item.

value.span: 值，以零起始的索引表示預設圖例關聯之資料點的位置。

span.span: An value that represents the location of the default legend's associated data point in a zero-based index.

value.span: 除了圓形圖與環圈圖以外的其他所有圖表類型，都會傳回負一 (-1)。

span.span: All chart types except for pie and doughnut charts will return a negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該只能用於事件，以判斷預設圓形圖或球體圖表圖例項目所表示的物件。This property should only be used in the event to determine the object that is represented by a default pie or sphere chart legend entry. 圖表類型而非圓形圖或球體圖表將會傳回負一 (-1)，因為預設圖例項目對應到繪製數列，而且不會進行繪製資料點。Chart types other than pie or sphere charts will return a negative one (-1), because the default legend items correspond to plotted series, and not plotted data points. 使用這些屬性的圖表類型。Use the property for these chart types. 開發人員不應該設定這個屬性。This property should not be set by the developer. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性就適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的陰影色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color of a legend item.

value.span: 值，表示圖例項目的陰影色彩。

span.span: A value that represents the shadow color of a legend item.

value.span: 預設色彩為 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定陰影的色彩數個圖表項目，而且可以是設定為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值。Gets or sets the shadow color of several chart elements, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用來達到 「 真實 」 的遮蔽效果;請嘗試使用陰影色彩的"128,0,0,0 」。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try using a color of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要實作一個陰影，將屬性為零 (0) 以外的值。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0). **附註**，這個值只適用於具有物件任一或。**Note** This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例項目的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a legend item.

value.span: 值，表示相關圖表項目的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the relevant chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要實作的遮蔽功能，使用零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0). 正值會移到右邊的陰影。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right. 負值會導致移位至左邊的陰影。A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left. **附註**，這個值只適用於具有物件任一或。**Note** This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 關鍵字[rs_vsDataVis]](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c)。For more information, see [Keywords [rs_vsDataVis]](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c). > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性就適用於整個。This property is applicable to the entire .
